name: Way Back Into Love
word: The minute you think of giving up, think of the reason why you held on so long.

name: Too Far
word: Love look not with the eyes, but with the mind. — William Shakespeare

name: Tales of the Electric Romeo
word: Promises are often like the butterfly, which disappear after beautiful hover.

name: Take It All In
word: Fading is true while flowering is past

name: Sunny Day
word: to feel the flame of dreaming and to feel the moment of dancing,when all the romance is far away,the eternity is always there

name: Summertrain
word: The darkness is no darkness with thee.

name: She
word: Where there is love, there are always wishes.

name: Reality
word: 当你的眼睛一直看着天空,永远不要忘记你的脚始终沾着尘土！

name: Only One
word: 我不知道梦的尽头是什么,但我知道,梦的醒来是一无所有

name: Nothing's Gonna Change My Love For You
src: musics/Nothing's Gonna Change My Love For You.mp3
word: A bad beginning makes a bad ending.

name: No One But You
word: 岁月极美,在于它必然的流逝 春花 秋月 夏日 冬雪

name: King In The Mirror
word: 一个人至少拥有一个梦想,有一个理由去坚强 心若没有栖息的地方,到哪里都是在流浪

name: I'll Be A Virgin, I'll Be A Mountain
src: musics/I'll Be A Virgin, I'll Be A Mountain.mp3
word: Life is a journey,not the destination,but the scenery along the should be and the mood at the view.

name: I Just Wanna Run
word: To the world you may be one person, but to one person you may be the world.

name: I Don't Live In a Dream
src: musics/I Don't Live In a Dream.mp3
word: Until you make peace with who you are, you’ll never be content with what you have.

name: Hello
word: If you wish to succeed, you should use persistence as your good friend, experience as your reference, prudence as your brother and hope as your sentry.

name: Gotta Have You
word: Between the ideal and the reality,Between the motion and the act, Fall the shadow.

name: Fuerteventura
word: I would rather have questions that can't be answered than answers that can't be questioned.

name: Firefly
word: Sometimes, the same thing, we can go to the comfort of others, but failed to convince yourself.

name: Faded
word: If you're brave enough to say GOODBYE, life will reward you with a new HELLO.

name: blue moment
word: There’s nothing more beautiful than a smile that struggles through tears.

name: Battles and Wastelands
word: The biggest mistake we have made in our daily life is to be too polite to strangers but too strict to close friends.

name: Apologize
word: better than yesterday. Do it everyday, grow better!
Use your smile to change the world. Don't let the world change your smile.

name: 7 Years
word: Sometimes, we need a little tears to clear the mist in our eyes, a little assurance to clear the doubts in our head, a little hug to nurse our aching heart.

name: 明日への扉
word: The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.

name: You
word: Because the things you're scared of are usually the most worthwhile.

name: Yellow
word: Never frown, even when you are sad, because you never know who is falling in love with your smile.

name: You Speak
word: Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass. it's about learning to dance in the rain.

name: Wisdom
word: There's a difference between love and like. If you like a flower you will pick it, but if you love a flower, you will water it every day.
